mapper.select: SELECT GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID AS generalRecordScheduleUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, GRS_CODE AS grsCode, GRS_NAME AS grsName, RETENION_PERIOD_UUID AS retenionPeriodUuid, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID AS disposalTypeUuid, BASED_ON AS basedOn, TRIGGER_YN AS triggerYn, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, USE_YN AS useYn, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM RS_GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE

SELECT GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID AS generalRecordScheduleUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, GRS_CODE AS grsCode, GRS_NAME AS grsName, RETENION_PERIOD_UUID AS retenionPeriodUuid, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID AS disposalTypeUuid, BASED_ON AS basedOn, TRIGGER_YN AS triggerYn, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, USE_YN AS useYn, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM RS_GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE WHERE GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = #{generalRecordScheduleUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE RS_GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE SET STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, GRS_CODE = #{grsCode}, GRS_NAME = #{grsName}, RETENION_PERIOD_UUID = #{retenionPeriodUuid}, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID = #{disposalTypeUuid}, BASED_ON = #{basedOn}, TRIGGER_YN = #{triggerYn}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = #{generalRecordScheduleUuid}

INSERT INTO RS_GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE ( GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID, STATUS_UUID, GRS_CODE, GRS_NAME, RETENION_PERIOD_UUID, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID, BASED_ON, TRIGGER_YN, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, USE_YN, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{generalRecordScheduleUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{grsCode}, #{grsName}, #{retenionPeriodUuid}, #{disposalTypeUuid}, #{basedOn}, #{triggerYn}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{useYn}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
